The California newspaper: San Diego Union-Tribune, debunked the attempt by Donald Trump to criticize pro football players protesting extrajudicial killings by police.
The photograph shared by Trump on Twitte: implying it was the widow of a veteran killed in the line of duty.
The newspaper confirmed that the photogr: but the major depicted in the photo was not killed in action. He died in a motorcycle accident in September 2013.
The original tweet by another user: Corey Jones, failed to mention that Colin Kaepernick, the originator of the protest, consulted with an Army Special Forces veteran before kneeling during the national anthem.
